title: New York Attorney General Letitia James Ends Gubernatorial Bid
sub_head: Democrat says she will seek second term as state’s top prosecutor
body:
New York state Attorney General Letitia James said Thursday that she was dropping her bid for governor and would seek another term in her current office.
Ms. James, a Democrat, declared her candidacy several months after her office released a report that concluded former Gov. Andrew Cuomo sexually harassed multiple women. Mr. Cuomo has denied touching anybody inappropriately and said Ms. James’s investigation was politically motivated.
